org.finra.herd.rest

Class SecurityRoleRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.rest.SecurityRoleRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest",
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public class SecurityRoleRestController
extends Object
    The REST controller that handles security role REST requests.

    • Method Detail

      • createSecurityRole

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityRoles",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_ROLES_POST")
public SecurityRole createSecurityRole(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       SecurityRoleCreateRequest securityRoleCreateRequest)
        Creates a new security role.
        Parameters:
        securityRoleCreateRequest - the information needed to create a security role
        Returns:
        the created security role

      • deleteSecurityRole

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityRoles/{securityRoleName}",
                method=DELETE)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_ROLES_DELETE")
public SecurityRole deleteSecurityRole(@PathVariable(value="securityRoleName")
                                                                                                                                                                             String securityRoleName)
        Deletes an existing security role.
        Parameters:
        securityRoleName - the security role name
        Returns:
        the deleted security role

      • getSecurityRole

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityRoles/{securityRoleName}",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_ROLES_GET")
public SecurityRole getSecurityRole(@PathVariable(value="securityRoleName")
                                                                                                                                                                    String securityRoleName)
        Retrieves an existing security role.
        Parameters:
        securityRoleName - the security role name
        Returns:
        the retrieved security role

      • getSecurityRoles

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityRoles",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_ROLES_ALL_GET")
public SecurityRoleKeys getSecurityRoles()
        Gets a list of security role keys for all security roles registered in the system. The result list is sorted by security role name in ascending order.
        Returns:
        the list of security role keys

      • updateSecurityRole

        @RequestMapping(value="/securityRoles/{securityRoleName}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_SECURITY_ROLES_PUT")
public SecurityRole updateSecurityRole(@PathVariable(value="securityRoleName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String securityRoleName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        SecurityRoleUpdateRequest securityRoleUpdateRequest)
        Updates an existing security role.
        Parameters:
        securityRoleName - the security role name
        securityRoleUpdateRequest - the information required to update a security role
        Returns:
        the updated security role
